review: Generally pretty good. Having a couple of problems:- text in the apps is pretty small, at least on my fairly small TV. The text is sharp, but in the body of a movie description, for example, I cannot see it from across the room. Maybe I'm just the wrong age :-) Of course, there is a nice big picture of the advertising graphic - which is of zero informational value...- there is a Spotify app, but you have to use a smartphone app to drive it - and, at the moment, that works about 2% of the time. The android app spent see the fire stick app. Mostly, it's useless.

review: Finding content is a bit of work, but that's mostly because there's SO MUCH available. In fact, the only downside we've found after a week or so is that other throughputs on our Panasonic Viera TV sporadically drop to black and white, and even then a simple unplug/re-plug cycle sets things right.Mind you, we have Amazon Prime, and that makes a lot of the content free to view. But we're quite happy with it.
